entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-09-17
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [browser] Support structs with JavaScript interop #92198
  • [nativeaot] SYS_SECCOMP signal on android with mediatek CPU #92196
  • ./build.sh libs.native fails #92194
  • Add support for `ISpanFormattable` in `StringBuilder.Append(Object)` #92193
  • [API Proposal]: Add collection builders for frozen collection types #92190
    9.0.0
  • CopyOutputSymbolsToPublishDirectory is not respected #92188

Closed

  • `GetFromJsonAsAsyncEnumerable` extension default json serialize option is not the same as `GetFromJson` #92179
    8.0.0
  • EventPipe: Switch to CAPTURE_STATE and Remove Rundown Provider #9603
    Future
  • Roadmap information on System.Numerics AVX-512 vectorization needed #92189
  • [wasm] System.Collections.Tests assert in sgen-scan-object.h:93 #86860
    9.0.0
  • [8.0][mono][wasm] Assertion mono-internal-hash.c:47, condition `table->table != NULL' not met #91244
    8.0.0
  • [wasi] out of bounds memory access in System.Runtime.Serialization.Xml.Tests #91344
    9.0.0
  • Intrinsics for generic math #88005
    Future
  • Assertion failed '!m_VariableLiveRanges->back().m_EndEmitLocation.Valid()' during 'Generate code' #91215
    8.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/8.0] Update HttpClientJsonExtensions.Get.AsyncEnumerable.cs #92199
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Net, 8.0.0
  • Add support for ISpanFormattable in StringBuilder.Append(Object) #92197
    community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • Improve the help message in build.ps1 #92192
    community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • Fix trimming of DebuggerDisplay with Name #92191
    linkable-framework, community-contribution, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Ensure the adapter name 100% matching when parsing proc/net/dev #92187
    area-System.Net, community-contribution

Merged

  • Update HttpClientJsonExtensions.Get.AsyncEnumerable.cs #92180
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution
  • Optimize if range check to replace jumps to bit operation #87656
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Add optimisation of incrementing SELECT at lowering on arm64. #91262
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix register resolution handling of RefTypeUpperVectorRestore #92171
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Updated

  • Fix: Config binder generator doesn't generate code when named arguments are out of order #91961
    area-Extensions-Configuration
  • [release/8.0] Make src gen for property setters consistent with reflection #92167
    Servicing-consider, area-Extensions-Configuration, 8.0.0
  • JIT: Extract all side effects of the index in optRemoveRangeCheck #92116
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Initialize jitstdout lazily #92123
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Make config binding gen incremental #89587
    area-Extensions-Configuration, 8.0.0
  • Optimise long multiply + add/sub/neg on arm64. #91886
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • [release/8.0] [mono][aot] Avoid compiling the same method multiple times during dedup. #92178
    Servicing-approved, arch-wasm, area-Codegen-AOT-mono, 8.0.0
  • Update the assert for BlendVariable #92183
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/8.0] [workloads] Opt into using package groups #92168
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries, 8.0.0
  • [release/8.0] [browser] Add link to docs to interop error messages #92182
    Servicing-approved, arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 8.0.0
  • fixed problems with how sampling is done and how we suspend to change heap count in DATAS #91712
  • [wasi] Ongoing AOT work #92186
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono

entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • Re-enable EndToEnd_NoAPI_Web test #33858
  • Cannot precompile blazor wasm with RunAOTCompilation set to true inside docker #29757
  • .NET 7 Android workload could not be loaded #29242

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-09-17
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • Error when using collection-expression for an array-typed attribute argument. #69133
    17.8

PullRequests

Created

  • Support converting collection-initializers to collection-expressions in more cases. #69983
    Area-IDE, untriaged

Updated

  • EnC: Parameter and property analysis #69774
    Area-Interactive, untriaged
  • Add support for collection expressions in attributes #69968
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Collection Expressions, 17.8

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-09-17
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Hot reload changes not applied for WebAssembly-rendered pages in Blazor Web app #50765
  • Perf regression: plainTextWithFilter #50764
  • HttpContext.Response.Headers setter changes casing of HTTP header #50763
  • RazorComponentResult returned component cannot execute clientside code #50762
  • Httpclient dns translation should be configurable #50761
  • BlazorWeb antiforgery issue on SignInAsync. #50760
  • Improve exception message on exceptions produced during rendering #50759

Closed

  • Code duplication between `IdentityServiceCollectionExtensions` and `IdentityCookiesBuilderExtensions` #49449
    Discussions
  • Perf regression: plaintext #50751
  • [PackageId]: [version(s)] #50736
  • Perf improvement: https, plainTextEmptyFilter #50696

PullRequests

Updated

  • [Blazor] Prerendered state #50742
    area-blazor
  • Persist Prerendered State #50625
    area-blazor
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 1159: Build ID 2269354 #50757
    area-mvc
  • Try Adding Support for XForwardedPort #50338
    community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-networking
  • Retry stateful reconnect attempts #50745
    area-signalr

Created

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-09-17
entry.content:
Issues

Created

Closed

  • Initial Query Performance in Entity Framework 7 #31781
  • Migration inconsistently generates nullable columns for derived classes #27859
    Backlog
  • EF Core compiled model is broken for EF8 RC1 #31727
    8.0.0
  • Using `char` properties results in in exception from the compiled model #31720
    8.0.0

PullRequests

Created

Merged

    area-infrastructure, auto-merge, type-merge forward :fast_forward:
